# Welcome to Your AI Journal

This is a minimal sample journal structure for testing purposes.

## Getting Started

Your journal has been set up with the following folders:

- `daily/` - Daily notes and reflections
- `projects/` - Active project tracking
- `people/` - Relationship and conversation logs
- `areas/` - Ongoing areas of responsibility
- `resources/` - Reference materials
- `memories/` - Captured insights and breakthroughs
- `archive/` - Completed projects and old notes

## Next Steps

Start journaling by having a conversation with your AI coach!
